summary: When a politician disappears, his (mad) twin brother is brought to replace him.
cast: Toni Servillo|Valerio Mastandrea|Valeria Bruni Tedeschi|Michela Cescon|Gianrico Tedeschi|Eric Nguyen|Andrea Renzi|Judith Davis|Brice Fournier|Paolo Bessegato|Giulia Andò|Alessandro Averone|Vincenzo Pirrotta|Giovanni Lombardo Radice|Antonio Gerardi|Lucia Mascino|Saskia Vester|Stella Kent|Massimo De Francovich|Renato Scarpa|Anna Bonaiuto|Marco Balsamo|Lionel Becimol|Giovanna Cappuccio|Paola Caprara|Francesco Carrassi|Aurelio D'Amore|Armanda Di Stazio|Guillaume Faure|Annalisa Lori|Marianella Laszlo|Olivier Martinaud|Massimo Onofri|Tibor Radvanyi|Benjamin Rataud|Marielle de Rocca-Serra|Federico Torre|Veronika Varga|Sandro Volpe|Carla Cagnetti|Julie Morel|Federico Fellini
title: Viva la libertad
